title: Alternative flours from pulp melons (Cucumis melo L.): Seasonality influence on physical, chemical, technological parameters, and utilization in bakery product
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Luciana Daniela Gurgel de Medeiros, Leticya Bianca Almeida de Carvalho, Erika Paula Silva Freitas, Dayanne Lopes Porto, Cícero Flávio Soares Aragão, Francisco Canindé de Sousa Júnior, Karla Suzanne Florentino da Silva Chaves Damasceno, Cristiane Fernandes de Assis, Ana Heloneida Araújo Morais, Thaís Souza Passos
